column1: From my family to yours Happy Thanksgiving.

I will be celebrating virtually with family. While we won’t be in person this year we are thankful that we will get to be with our oldest son Adam who just returned home after active duty with the U.S. Navy. And Daniel though far away will be on our screen and in our hearts.

Happy Thanksgiving! In spite of the unprecedented burdens of the COVID pandemic there are still many blessings around us. There is a light at the end of this long dark tunnel. But we are not yet through the danger.
A win for democracy.  https://t.co/0ED2iznoW5
He’s also made 0 addresses to the nation as we suffer the worst weeks of the pandemic yet. https://t.co/eotC6HUG7Q

Today Illinois enters Tier 3 mitigation to curb the spread of COVID-19. While not a stay-at-home order this advisory places tighter limitations on restaurants and social gatherings. Please stay safe - if we all do our part we can beat back this virus.   https://t.co/li1hintB7i

As cases skyrocket statewide suburban Cook County and other areas have issued updated stay-at-home advisories. Please stay safe observe these advisories and continue to follow the 3 W’s: Wear a mask wash your hands and watch your distance.  https://t.co/SWoAQzZ1Kx
After a long hard-fought campaign the American people have spoken in a convincing manner. https://t.co/qxJTAOZauf

If we’re going to pass real COVID relief to tackle the virus and revive our economy in a closely divided Congress we’re going to have to learn how to compromise and put the good of the Country before our political party.  https://t.co/gGocXcQtMF

Despite the President’s baseless claims of voter fraud top government officials found that this election was conducted legally and transparently. The people spoke with their vote and Joe Biden will be our next president. https://t.co/w4vmmlLvAK
There was never a doubt in my mind. Congratulations @LaurenUnderwood! https://t.co/6ybYMeQ4PW
Congratulations to my good friend @LaurenUnderwood on winning re-election to Illinois's 14th District! https://t.co/AKiX9d3udF

Under President-Elect Joe Biden we will beat back this virus and restore our economy. Happy to talk with @calev_i24 over the weekend about Joe Biden and Kamala Harris’s historic win. https://t.co/WGrETv7lcV
Following the lead of the new President-Elect America must embark on a mission of renewal working together to beat back the pandemic and build back our economy—better. (3/3)
I salute all who voted and extend a huge thank you to the many thousands of election judges ballot counters and others who worked tirelessly to make sure our democratic tradition continues. (2/3)

I want to first congratulate President-Elect Joe Biden and our nation.    Second despite the pandemic despite the rancor America conducted a national election in which record number of people participated. (1/3)

The People spoke with their vote. Lawfully cast votes — whether for President Trump or Joe Biden - have the right to be counted. We will have a legal and transparent election regardless of what the President says or claims.
America needs Joe Biden. Count every vote! https://t.co/WrOf7qfVHs

After last night’s win we have work to do.  I’m confident that Joe Biden and Lauren Underwood are on their way to win.  What our election makes clear is that we desperately need unifying leadership to beat back Covid unite our people and renew our country’s possibilities. https://t.co/v6RyYR8590
Thank you IL-10! https://t.co/mewLS2r0t6

In 2008 I canvassed for Obama & Biden because I believed our future would be better with them. In 2012 I ran for Congress because I worried our children’s future was at risk. In 2020 I am fighting to elect Joe Biden because our future is literally hanging in the balance. VOTE! https://t.co/tE3hTd5tWq
I’ll always remember the time Bruce Springsteen and I worked together to elect Joe Biden. Will you join us? https://t.co/tsftGDJLB4

Today is the last day to submit an application for a mail-in ballot in Illinois. Make sure to request your ballot by 5:00 pm today or you can still vote in-person at an Early Voting location or on Election Day at your assigned polling place. https://t.co/IR5Od5s3Jw

This pandemic is far from over. While we are all tired of COVID-19 restrictions we can’t simply wish the virus away. We must behave safely and observe the 3 W’s: Wash your hands wear your mask and watch your distance. Together we can beat back this virus. https://t.co/LXgBag5GLp
This election my colleagues and I are voting for science environmental justice and climate action. Join us in voting for the future of our planet on Nov. 3. https://t.co/8QwoMRHIBr

What I do know is that Joe Biden has a plan and on Day 1 of the new administration President Biden will lead the effort to beat back the virus. And I will do everything I can to help him restore Americans’ health care and help build our country back better. (5/5)

I don’t know where our nation goes from here. I don’t know how any self-described leader could right now give up on millions of Americans fighting a deadly disease and instead rush to pack America’s highest court and end the ACA as the President and McConnell have done. (4/5)

Today’s vote will have extraordinary consequences for all Americans particularly those 130 million with pre-existing conditions. The fallout for those who have and will contract the virus — now a preexisting condition — is unknowable and tragic. (3/5)

This weekend the White House Chief of Staff admitted that they’ve given up fighting this virus. Instead President Trump and the Republicans have done everything they can in rushing to fill a seat on the Supreme Court in time to end the Affordable Care Act on November 10th (2/5)

In the United States 8.7 million people have tested positive for the coronavirus. More than 225000 people have died.  Only 9 countries have more deaths per million population.  We are in a national crisis (1/5)

This recent milestone is heartbreaking. My heart goes out to all those who have been affected directly and indirectly by COVID-19. Please do your part to beat back this virus by wearing a mask washing your hands and watching your distance. Together we will get through this. https://t.co/KYydxaHn8c

We can choose a path of becoming angrier less hopeful more divided. A path of shadow and suspicion. Or we can choose a different path and together take this chance to heal. - Joe Biden https://t.co/0kXA3FJFHk
Facts facts facts  Vs  Lies lies lies.

President Trump has empowered our adversaries to continue interfering in our elections. I introduced the DETER Act to stand up and create consequences for foreign actors intent on undermining our democracy.
Joe Biden will stand up:  Against the virus  Against Russia and Iran  And for Americans from both red and blue states.  He will build us back better.
A reminder - if we are going to beat back this virus we need to defeat Donald Trump on November 3. https://t.co/QovHbUVZ2y

As cases start to rise we can’t afford to let our guard down. But we can still find ways to stay connected. Stay vigilant and remember the 3 Ws: Wear a mask Wash your hands and Watch your distance. Working together is how we get through this pandemic.  https://t.co/lZ9qw0dt5I
I am excited to share that my new ad “Team” started running today! It’s an optimistic message about how we can work together to beat back this virus and renew our nation. https://t.co/ruMs16yH2Y

I am so proud that Molly continues to be an advocate for the LGBTQ community. Watching her grow from spearheading the Buffalo Grove Pride Parade last year to speaking on an international stage about LGBTQ rights at age 14 has been truly inspiring. https://t.co/EDM49kMrpM

Judge Amy Coney Barrett is a threat to the Affordable Care Act women's health care and the health care of all with pre-existing conditions. One week after the election the ACA is before the Supreme Court. Our votes matter more this year than ever before. https://t.co/nGCyL6sPgQ
This is great to see. Climate change is one of the great challenges of this generation and we must tackle it immediately. https://t.co/Q3X6Yde1lO
Fact check: True. https://t.co/OBKVFhATtz
A Biden-Harris ticket has a plan to fight Covid a plan to fight climate change and a plan to build back better #VPDebate
“We can end this era of division. We can end the hate and the fear. We can be what we are at our best: The United States of America.” - Joe Biden https://t.co/TdcdeBSBYQ

In just 6 months more than 210000 have died from the coronavirus. While I am relieved that President Trump appears to be recovering this completely disrespects COVID-19 victims and the massive challenges our nation still faces. The president must lead by example. https://t.co/CvBqxX33QQ
Joe Biden showed America tonight why he is ready to be our President and lead our nation through one of the greatest crises we have ever faced.

Christopher Wray testified that white supremacists and racially motivated violent extremists are the greatest domestic national security threat. Trump not only refuses to accept his own FBI’s assessment he refused to tell the white supremacist groups to stand down.
Tragically there's still no plan not even a hint Trump has clue what needs to be done.  Joe has a plan!

Anticipating tonight’s debate all I wanted to hear from the President was a comprehensive plan to beat the virus and stop people from getting sick and dying. More than 7 million infected and 200000 American lives lost (family friends neighbors).
Mr. President either you paid $750 in income tax or you didn’t.  Release your taxes!

This election will be a decision between a President who will expand the Affordable Care Act with a public option and a President who thinks the cost of insulin is “like water.”  Our health care is on the line. The difference is vast. It’s never been more urgent to vote.

I am so proud to be endorsed by @PPact. SCOTUS nominee Amy Coney Barrett has a history of supporting restrictions on abortion access but I refuse to let the courts attack our hard-fought victories for women’s health care. I am 100% pro-choice and I will always stand with @PPact. https://t.co/CNQKkwYdDk

Ten out of fifteen years President Trump didn’t pay anything in taxes. In light of his failures as a taxpayer and businessman we should have been able to see coming his failure to handle this pandemic and save hundreds of thousands of lives. https://t.co/ziKlPwJej6

Thank you to the Black Student Union of Warren Township High School for inviting me to say a few words yesterday at Voting Registration Drive in Gurnee.   This is the most important election of our lifetime. VOTE! https://t.co/oVokIpw6wz
We pray for her family and we pray for our nation.   May her memory be a blessing. https://t.co/OcbyZytCRb

This is an outrageous and completely irresponsible statement from President Trump.   The climate emergency is already here and we must act now.  My thoughts are with those affected and sincerest gratitude to those fighting the fires on the fronts lines. https://t.co/BTUyYYSQDy
We will never forget their sacrifice and will forever honor their memory.

We must also reflect on the countless people who have served in the years since in ways known and unknown to protect our nation. America lost 2349 casualties in Operation Enduring Freedom. Still today nearly two decades later more than 8000 U.S. troops serve in Afghanistan.

That day the bravest among us our first responders fire fighters and police selflessly rushed into danger risking their own lives to save others. Their example serves as a testament to the exceptional American spirit.

Nineteen years ago today America suffered a terrible loss on 9/11 when 19 terrorists struck the heart of our nation killing nearly 3000 Americans. Every year we rightfully pause to remember those who died in New York Pennsylvania and at the Pentagon.
Making our communities safer requires standing up to the gun lobby. I’m proud of my ‘F’ from the NRA and I won’t stop working on solutions to reduce gun violence. https://t.co/BYX88yQTh0

The President has always known about the severity of COVID-19 but failed to protect the American people.  Now 194k Americans have died from the virus. And the administration still doesn’t have a plan as our children go back to school and we enter flu season. https://t.co/un6aAXNy9O
8 weeks to go until we elect this ticket for President. Let's continue to work! https://t.co/psYmZBVVSc
This is utterly reprehensible and disgraceful https://t.co/Y2iCvnGR2G
It's not too late to complete the 2020 census!  Make sure you and your family are counted.  It takes less than 10 min to complete at: https://t.co/h8M9krVX1o https://t.co/eh1IgBb0Sl
Lake County residents:   Here are the drop box locations for vote by mail ballots.   Please feel free to share with your friends and family! https://t.co/xKhRUdeRuu
Tonight Joe Biden is our candidate. On November 3rd he will be the President-Elect.   On January 20th our future will be renewed.
Incredible tribute to John Lewis and his work for civil rights. https://t.co/WekqiXCvLn
This is an impressive list of true patriots. Every Republican who cares about our county and its future should heed their call. https://t.co/NWgjt3sfpp
Michelle Obama just gave a speech for the ages but more importantly the perfect speech for the moment.
It is unacceptable for him to lead the party at a time of transition with these charges against him and especially through an election.
The charges against Senator Link are serious and deeply disturbing.  It was appropriate for him to step down from his position on the ethics committee but it’s not enough.

Those of us in public office must be held to a higher standard as we are entrusted by our constituents to always represent their interests before our own.  That is true at every level of service national state or local.
A great choice for America! https://t.co/hG6yZwo1U2
Meanwhile we witness the daily tragedy of this dangerous virus that has now killed more than 137000 Americans.   It's simply outrageous and totally unacceptable.

The President retweeting this reaffirms what we already know. He doesn't believe in science or the seriousness of this virus. He believes that pretending Covid-19 doesn't exist will make it go away. https://t.co/vNu0sKEUey

Tucker Carlson's attack on Tammy Duckworth is shameful and so obviously wrong.  Senator Duckworth lost her legs serving our country when her Black Hawk helicopter was shot down in Iraq. She is an American hero. @TammyforIL https://t.co/1U8sir2moH

There are two options: President Trump knew and did nothing. Or he didn't know because he didn't care to do his job as Commander in Chief.    It's unacceptable at all levels. The Administration needs to brief all Members of Congress now so the American people know the truth. https://t.co/ShtBd9uRWI

￼This is great news. The Supreme Court has powerfully reaffirmed a woman’s constitutional right to make her own decisions about her health family and future no matter her zip code. https://t.co/y01DT61BVt

President Trump’s attempts to gut Obamacare during a global pandemic that has already killed 125000 Americans is nothing short of cruel. Sadly it's just standard operating procedure for this President and Administration. https://t.co/lAfuCjPATM
This is completely irresponsible from the President. We are not going to end this pandemic by pretending it doesn’t exist. We need more testing not less. https://t.co/SahPwzkoeI

This is great news from the Supreme Court this morning. President Trump's attempt to end DACA was always cruel wrong and un-American. DREAMers are part of the fabric of our society. https://t.co/iKr4cAaS1a
It's outrageous that these are the lengths our Governors have to go to get the President to do his job. https://t.co/i6hNla6nNR
This is beneath the office of the presidency. This pandemic is not a game. https://t.co/sqlMpTK1S7
The results are in - Illinois is for @JoeBiden! https://t.co/fbj47Taldo

Polls are still open in Illinois! Voting is one of the important and sacred duties for us as Americans. In fact as we watch the response of the President and federal government during this crisis we are reminded why these elections are so vitally important and consequential.
Voting is one of the important and sacred duties for us as Americans. We hope you will continue to plan on voting to make your voice heard this March. #IL10
If you can we definitely recommend voting early. Voting in Lake and Cook County is open through Monday. You should experience quicker lines!
So if you are feeling healthy not experiencing symptoms and don’t believe you’ve been exposed to coronavirus please feel comfortable voting.

Election officials are taking proper measures to ensure the safety of each voter  - spacing lines cleaning machines passing out hand sanitizer - and working closely with public health officials to carry out our elections in a safe and secure way.
We totally understand that feeling. However we want you to know that voting remains safe.

We wanted to connect as we are now just a few days from Election Day in Illinois. We have of course heard from folks that have been feeling a little anxious about the safety of voting while our country begins to deal with an uptick in coronavirus cases.

So proud to be joined by 37 leaders from across #IL10 in supporting @JoeBiden. We need a nominee who will restore America’s standing in the world fight for working families and bring our country together. I am excited about the strong enthusiasm for his campaign here at home. https://t.co/4FoGotAb2n

Congrats to Joe Biden on a big win in South Carolina! Excited to vote here in Illinois on March 17 for the strongest candidate to defeat President Trump flip the Senate and protect our Democratic House majority.

One of the reasons I’m supporting Joe Biden is because of his strong foreign policy record. We need someone in the White House who can restore American leadership to meet the challenges of the 21st Century. #WeKnowJoe https://t.co/Bj29fGcMOA

Russia is again interfering in our election to help President Trump. And rather than the President taking seriously this threat to our democracy he’s more concerned with keeping Congress and the American people in the dark.
This is outrageous and wholly unacceptable. https://t.co/0cKeHQznFH
Today we celebrate the birth and legacy of one of the greatest U.S. Presidents Abraham Lincoln. We can learn so much from Mr. Lincoln. https://t.co/Djt6Lm5p93

The National Rifle Association has flagrantly abused its tax-exempt status to enrich its leadership and the American taxpayer is stuck paying the bill. That's why I have called on the IRS to investigate whether the NRA’s tax-exempt status should be eliminated. https://t.co/7vL23kEUpB
While the Senate failed to hold the President accountable the American people certainly will at the ballot box this November.

The evidence to convict President Trump was clear and overwhelming. It's shameful that Republican Senators chose to ignore it putting partisan politics ahead of their duty to our country and Constitution.

Voting to deny witnesses is indefensible. The Republican Senators doing so are putting their party politics ahead of patriotism. The Senate is failing its duty to check the Presidency instead handing the President a blank check for further abuses. https://t.co/sLXoCdQaE7

Our nation needs an experienced leader who will immediately restore America’s standing in the world fight for working families & bring our country together. That leader is Joe Biden. I am proud to endorse him for President of the United States. https://t.co/YF0iaT3qUC
A Senate trial without witnesses is a cover-up. Plan and simple.   Now is the time to keep pressure on GOP Senators to uphold their oath and allow a fair trial.
